argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ecased.1 | |- ( ph -> -. ch ) |
| 2 |  | ecased.2 | |- ( ph -> ( ps \/ ch ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_jca | |- ( ph -> ( -. ch /\ ( ps \/ ch ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_orel2 | |- ( -. ch -> ( ( ps \/ ch ) -> ps ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_imp | |- ( ( -. ch /\ ( ps \/ ch ) ) -> ps ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ps ) |
\
 Deduction form of disjunctive syllogism.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 9-Dec-2017.)
